name: Crunch Time (StrikerXYZ)
description:
[Top Down Shooter]

You are a programmer stuck in a digital world. You must fix all the bugs before your project submission deadline using:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Shoot (Patch bugs)

Hint: Activily look for and patch bugs to increase your time

This a prototype meant for a game jam themed "Find-It Fix-It"

Backtrace: https://crunchtime.sp.backtrace.io/p/CrunchTime/explore

Fixing 1 bug may reveal 99 bugs.
